    f:f32[2,4] = abs e
    g:f32[] = jit[

          i:f32[] = jit[

                k:f32[1,1] = broadcast_in_dim[

                  sharding=None
                ] j
                l:f32[1,1] = div k 8.0:f32[]
                m:f32[2,4] = sub f l
                n:f32[2,4] = square m
                o:f32[] = convert_element_type[
                  new_dtype=float32
                  weak_type=False
                ] h
                p:f32[] = sub 8.0:f32[] o
                q:f32[] = reduce_sum[axes=(0, 1) out_sharding=None] n
                r:f32[] = div q p
                s:bool[] = gt p 0.0:f32[]
                i:f32[] = jit[
                  name=_where
                  jaxpr={ lambda ; s:bool[] r:f32[] t:f32[]. let
                      u:f32[] = convert_element_type[
                        new_dtype=float32
                        weak_type=False
                      ] t
                      i:f32[] = select_n s u r
                    in (i,) }
                ] s r nan:f32[]
              in (i,) }
          ] f h
          g:f32[] = sqrt i
        in (g,) }
    ] f 0:i32[]
  in (g,) }
